title: Why we keep failing to eradicate this disease, with YouTuber John Green
description: John Green has spent his career telling stories — through novels, YouTube videos, and educational projects like Crash Course. Now, he’s on a mission to eliminate tuberculosis: a curable disease that still kills more than a million people every year.
